pageContent: Purpose: Previous studies have provided evidence of the high expression of lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) in multiple solid tumors; however, its prognostic relationship with metastatic prostate cancer (mPCa) remains controversial. We performed a meta-analysis to better understand the prognostic potential of LDH in mPCa.

metaData.source:
Treatment strategies for high-risk locally advanced prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20062072/
